text: Michael Robert Turner (born 15 December 1964), known professionally as Michael Le Vell, is an English actor. He is known for his role as mechanic Kevin Webster in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street, which he has played continuously since 1983. ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:People acquitted of rape Category:Actors from Manchester
title: Michael Le Vell
